description.value:
Wondrous Item, Rare
This famous painting can divine the future. You can use an action to speak the paintingâ€™s command word while within 5 feet of it to cast the divination spell from it. When the painting divines the future, the fish in the painting turns its head toward you and replies in song, music magically accompanying it.
